Hi Band Families,
We need 4 more chaperones for Saturday. If you can help, please contact Susanna
post.content:
Hi Band Families,

We need 4 more chaperones for Saturday. If you can help, please contact Susanna at nrbandmom@gmail.com.

Thanks!
